channel.description: The lesson11-lab.yaml playbook contains some errors. Fix them according to the following instructions: • Use command-line tools and arguments to find the errors. Don’t fix them by just reading the YAML file, even if some errors are obvious. • After fixing an error in one task, start running the playbook with the next task. Try to avoid running the same task over and over again. • Before applying the template, use a dry-run and a diff to see what the template will change.
